mapper.select: SELECT A.SEQ, A.KIND, A.P_SEQ, A.CONTENTS, A.USER_ID, A.USER_IP, B.USER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(A.UPDATE_DATE,A.CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') UPDATE_DATE FROM REPLY A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE A.KIND = #{kind} AND A.P_SEQ = #{pSeq} ORDER BY 8 DESC
SELECT SEQ, CONTENTS FROM REPLY WHERE SEQ = #{rSeq}
UPDATE REPLY SET CONTENTS = #{contents}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE SEQ = #{rSeq}
